#include <cstdlib>
#include <cctype>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
#include <iostream>
#include <sstream>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
#include <stack>
#include <fstream>
#include <numeric>
#include <iomanip>
#include <bitset>
#include <list>
#include <stdexcept>
#include <functional>
#include <utility>
#include <ctime>
using namespace std;

#define PB push_back
#define MP make_pair

#define rep(i,n) for(int i=0;i<(n);++i)
#define REP(i,n) for(int i=1;i<=(n);++i)
#define FOR(i,l,h) for(int i=(l);i<=(h);++i)
#define FORD(i,h,l) for(int i=(h);i>=(l);--i)
#define print(expr) cout<<(#expr)<<" : "<<(expr)<<endl

typedef vector<int> VI;
typedef vector<string> VS;
typedef vector<double> VD;
typedef long long int64;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;

#ifdef ONLINE_JUDGE
const int _maxio=1000000;
char _buf[_maxio], *_s=_buf+_maxio;
inline char _getc(void){if(_s>=_buf+_maxio){memset(_buf,0,sizeof _buf);fread(_buf,sizeof(char),_maxio,stdin);_s=_buf;}return *(_s++);}
inline int ni(void){char _t=_getc();int _n=1,_res=0;while(_t!='-' && !isdigit(_t)) _t=_getc();if(_t=='-') { _n=-1; _t=_getc();}	while(isdigit(_t)) { _res = 10*_res + (_t&15); _t=_getc();}return _res*_n;}
#else
inline int ni(void) { int _t; scanf("%d",&_t); return _t; }
#endif

const int maxn=111;
int A[maxn][maxn], B[maxn][maxn], C[maxn][maxn];

int main(void)
{
	int T=ni();
	while(T--)
	{
		int n=ni(), m=ni();
		rep(i,n) rep(j,m) A[i][j]=ni();
		rep(i,n) rep(j,m) B[i][j]=ni();
		rep(i,n) rep(j,m) C[i][j]=ni();
		int64 ans=0;
		rep(i,n)
		{
			int *a=A[i], *b=B[i], *c=C[i];
			int64 res=0;
			rep(j,m) res=max(res,int64(min(a[j],b[j]))*c[j]);
			ans+=res;
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
}
